author: jtraglia
content: For `ExecutionLayerWithdrawRequest` (which replaces `ExecutionLayerExit`), why are we using the validator pubkey instead of the validator index? I think it would make sense to change this because (1) an index is smaller; 8 bytes vs 48 bytes, (2) `process_execution_layer_withdraw_request` uses the pubkey to get the index, and (3) consistency with `VoluntaryExit` which uses validator index.

author: jtraglia
content: Also, the EIP says that validator index would work too:

author: ralexstokes
content:
only reason i could see would be to avoid issues in the event we decide to start reusing the indices

although even then, we would roll out that change in a way such that you wouldn't have any problems (and, we should also think about replay protection here and there...)

so i'd support moving that field to the index rather than the public key
